Uses of Interface
com.google.enterprise.connector.spi.LocalDatabase

  • Packages that use LocalDatabase 
    Package Description
    com.google.enterprise.connector.spi
    Defines the SPI for connector developers who wish to write plug-ins to the Google Search Appliance.
    com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database  
    com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing  

    • Uses of LocalDatabase in com.google.enterprise.connector.spi

      Methods in com.google.enterprise.connector.spi that return LocalDatabase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalDatabase ConnectorPersistentStore.getLocalDatabase()
      Gets a LocalDatabase through which the connector can create and alter private data.

    • Uses of LocalDatabase in com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database

      Classes in com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database that implement LocalDatabase 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.LocalDatabaseImpl
      An implemenation of LocalDatabase, built as a thin wrapper upon JdbcDatabase and DatabaseResourceBundleManager.

    • Uses of LocalDatabase in com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing

      Classes in com.google.enterprise.connector.util.database.testing that implement LocalDatabase 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TestLocalDatabase
      A LocalDatabase implementation that uses an in-memory H2 database for storage and looks for DatabaseResourceBundles relative to the current directory or specified resource directory.
